io.netty.handler.codec.sctp

Class SctpInboundByteStreamHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelStateHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundMessageHandlerAdapter<SctpMessage>
          • io.netty.handler.codec.sctp.SctpInboundByteStreamHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelInboundMessageHandler<SctpMessage>, ChannelStateHandler

    public class SctpInboundByteStreamHandler
extends ChannelInboundMessageHandlerAdapter<SctpMessage>
    A ChannelHandler which receives SctpMessages which belong to a application protocol form a specific SCTP Stream and decode it as ByteBuf.
